weather.question: I fall from the sky, and help flowers grow. What am I?

hints.text: 💧I am wet.
☔ You need an umbrella when I fall.
🌱 Plants love me!

weather.question: I am big and yellow and hot in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 I come out during the day.
😎 You might need sunglasses when I'm shining.
🔥 I make you feel warm.

weather.question: I'm white and fluffy and float in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I look like something you might find on a farm.
☁️ I'm made of water droplets.
🌬️ Sometimes I bring rain.

weather.question: I am cold and white, and fall from the sky in winter. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am very cold.
☃️ You can build a snowman with me.
🌨️ I make the ground white.

weather.question: I blow through the trees and make them dance. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can make leaves fall.
💨 You can't see me, but you can feel me.
🪁 I help kites fly high!

weather.question: Sometimes after it rains, you can see me in the sky with many colors. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and violet.
✨ I look like a colorful arch.
🌧️☀️ I appear when the sun shines through the rain.

weather.question: I am loud and bright, and come with thunder during a storm. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I'm a flash of electricity.
⛈️ I often happen during a thunderstorm.
💥 Boom! You can hear thunder after you see me.

weather.question: I am the sound that you hear after lightning flashes during a storm. What am I?

hints.text: 🔊 I am a loud sound.
🌩️ I follow a flash of light.
👂You hear me after lightning.

weather.question: I'm a very strong wind that spins around and around. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I can pick things up and move them.
⚠️ It's important to stay inside when I come.
🏠 I can damage houses.

weather.question: I'm a big storm over the ocean with strong winds and lots of rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I cause big waves.
🚢 Boats try to avoid me.
🌀 I have a swirling center.

food.question: I am long and yellow, and monkeys love to peel me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys like to eat me.
💛 I am the color of sunshine.
📏 You peel off my skin to eat me.

food.question: I am round and red, and sometimes I’m juicy to bite into. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 Snow White ate one.
🌳 I grow on trees.
🔴 My color matches Santa's suit.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐮 I am good for your bones.
🥛 You can pour me in a glass.
🍚 I go well with cereal.

food.question: I am a colorful veggie, and bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 Bugs Bunny eats me!
🧡 I am often orange.
🌱 I grow in the ground.

food.question: I am small and green. You can eat me in a pod or right off the vine. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am the color of the Grinch.
🪴 I grow in a garden.
💪 Eating me can make you strong.

food.question: I am made from milk and I can be cold and sweet. I come in many flavors! What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I am a perfect summer treat.
🥄 You need a spoon to eat me.
🌈 I come in many different colours.

food.question: I am a grain that pops when it is hot, and I’m often eaten at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🎬 You eat me in the cinema
🌽 I come from a corn cob.
💥 I make a 'pop' sound when I'm cooking.

food.question: I'm round, orange, and grow on a vine. People carve me into a face at Halloween. What am I?

hints.text: 🎃 You can find me at Halloween
🧡 I am the color of oranges and tigers.
👻 I am made into Jack-O-Lanterns.

food.question: I am a brown food that grows underground. You can make fries out of me! What am I?

hints.text: 🍟 You can make french fries with me.
🥔 I grow under the soil.
🌎 I am shaped like a sphere.

food.question: I am a soft, white food made from milk, but I'm not ice cream or milk. I can be spread on crackers. What am I?

hints.text: 🧀 I am sometimes yellow or white.
🐭 Mice like to eat me.
🥪 I can be eaten in a sandwich.
